Morphometrics.name: {} By Object Area
Morphometrics.description: Ratio between sub-compartment area and the total structure area

Morphometrics.name: {} Area
Morphometrics.description: Total area of a given sub-compartment.

Morphometrics.name: Nuclei Number
Morphometrics.description: Number of nuclei contained within an object.

Morphometrics.name: Mean Aspect Ratio Nuclei
Morphometrics.description: Mean aspect ratio (major axis length divided by minor axis length) across all nuclei.

Morphometrics.name: Standard Deviation Aspect Ratio Nuclei
Morphometrics.description: Standard deviation of aspect ratio (major axis length divided by minor axis length) across all nuclei.

Morphometrics.name: Mean Nuclear Area
Morphometrics.description: Mean area of all nuclei within object.

Morphometrics.name: Total Object Area
Morphometrics.description: Total area of object measured in number of pixels

Morphometrics.name: Total Object Perimeter
Morphometrics.description: Total perimeter of object boundary measured in number of pixels

Morphometrics.name: Total Object Aspect Ratio
Morphometrics.description: Mean aspect ratio (major axis length divided by minor axis length) for an object.

Morphometrics.name: Major Axis Length
Morphometrics.description: Length of longest axis of ellipse with same normalized second central moments as object.

Morphometrics.name: Minor Axis Length
Morphometrics.description: Length of shortest axis of ellipse with same normalized second central moments as object.

Morphometrics.name: Contrast {}
Morphometrics.description: Measures intensity contrast between a pixel and its neighbor over the whole image. 0 for a 'constant' (all single color) image.

Morphometrics.name: Homogeneity {}
Morphometrics.description: Measures the closeness of the distribution of elements in the Gray-Level Co-occurrence Matrix (GLCM). 1 for a diagonal GLCM (constant, single-color image).

Morphometrics.name: Correlation {}
Morphometrics.description: Measures how correlated a pixel is to its neighbor over the whole image. 1 or -1 for a perfectly correlated image and a perfectly negative correlated image, NaN for a constant image (single color).

Morphometrics.name: Energy {}
Morphometrics.description: Sum of the square elements in the Gray-Level Co-occurrence Matrix (GLCM). 1 for a constant, single-color image.

Morphometrics.name: Mean Red {}
Morphometrics.description: Mean of red values (first color channel in RGB image) across a sub-compartment

Morphometrics.name: Mean Green {}
Morphometrics.description: Mean of green values (second color channel in RGB image) across a sub-compartment

Morphometrics.name: Mean Blue {}
Morphometrics.description: Mean of blue values (third color channel in RGB image) across a sub-compartment.

Morphometrics.name: Standard Deviation Red {}
Morphometrics.description: Standard deviation of red values (first color channel in RGB image) across a sub-compartment

Morphometrics.name: Standard Deviation Green {}
Morphometrics.description: Standard deviation of green values (second color channel in RGB image) across a sub-compartment

Morphometrics.name: Standard Deviation Blue {}
Morphometrics.description: Standard deviation of blue values (third color channel in RGB image) across a sub-compartment

Morphometrics.name: Sum Distance Transform By Object Area {}
Morphometrics.description: Sum of the distance transform values divided by total object area for a sub-compartment

Morphometrics.name: Sum Distance Transform {}
Morphometrics.description: Sum of the distance transform values for a sub-compartment

Morphometrics.name: Sum Distance Transform by {} Area
Morphometrics.description: Sum of distance transform values for a sub-compartment divided by total area of the same sub-compartment.

Morphometrics.name: Mean Distance Transform By Object Area {}
Morphometrics.description: Mean of distance transform values for a sub-compartment divided by total object area.

Morphometrics.name: Mean Distance Transform By {} Area
Morphometrics.description: Mean of distance transform values for a sub-compartment divided by total area of the same sub-compartment.

Morphometrics.name: Mean Distance Transform {}
Morphometrics.description: Mean distance transform values for a sub-compartment.

Morphometrics.name: Max Distance Transform By Object Area {}
Morphometrics.description: Maximum distance transform value for a sub-compartment divided by total object area.

Morphometrics.name: Max Distance Transform By {} Area
Morphometrics.description: Maximum distance transform value for a sub-compartment divided by total area of the same sub-compartment.

Morphometrics.name: Max Distance Transform {}
Morphometrics.description: Maximum distance transform value for a sub-compartment.
